relevant_communication:
Every year the European affairs team organises several conferences and info days in Brussels and in the Member States to inform stakeholders and policymakers about the challenges and the priorities of the European business aviation community. 
 
EU Affairs Publications in 2018: 
 
- Report on the impact of Brexit on Business Aviation 
- MEP Quarterly  
 
EU Affairs Events in 2018: 
 
- Roundtable on the impact of Brexit on Business Aviation 
- Conference at the European Parliament 'Business Aviation: what’s in it for European citizens?' 
- 2 Info days with MEPs in their constituency 'Meet Your MEP' 
- Cocktail Reception 'EBAA Back To Business' 
- Event organised in the framework of the European Week of Regions & Cities 
- Lunch Debate at the European Parliament 
 
More information available on www.ebaa.org
